name: Enc-Dec-AD
paper: LSTM-Based Encoder-Decoder for Multi-Sensor Anomaly Detection.
description: Long Short Term Memory Networks based Encoder-Decoder scheme for Anomaly Detection (EncDec-AD) that learns to reconstruct normal (i.e., anomaly free) time-series behavior, and thereafter uses reconstruction error to detect anomalies.
bibtex: @article{Malhotra2016LSTMbasedEF,title={LSTM-based Encoder-Decoder for Multi-sensor Anomaly Detection},author={Pankaj Malhotra and Anusha Ramakrishnan and Gaurangi Anand and Lovekesh Vig and Puneet Agarwal and Gautam M. Shroff},journal={ArXiv},year={2016},volume={abs/1607.00148},}
